[spoiler] i saw some of the remaining alive ones having their intestines coming out of their mouths, eating them back like spaghettis trying to breath[/spoiler]

i swear to god i have never seen that imagery before but somehow my mind managed to portray it perfectly.

also everything was presented into a cheap camera recording type of stuff, meaning i was recording it all.

topics.body:
Oh yeah I forgot to mention, while I was at my grandmothers I decided to play a little bit of Lost Odyssey. It's fun and the ring system is pretty interesting. 
[spoiler]Oh and the first Thousand Years of Dreams segment made me cry like a fifteen year old girl after her first bad breakup.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543e858663687269fb3e0000#post_543e858663687269fb3e0000

Actually, and like every dream, the dream about guts have its own meaning if you search it in the internet [spoiler]I do that everytime when I have a weird/disturbing/cool/funny dream[/spoiler]. 

There is a page that said "Dreaming about we eating our own intestines or other people indicates that there are some instinctive desires that lead us to make mistakes often." Another one said that "Dreaming about guts usually indicates that you expect for unexpected proves of diseases or surgery interventions."

topics.body:
You are attacked by a wizard
He curses you to be a monster for 1000 years 
To prove he's not the biggest dick in the world he lets you choose what type of monster you will be
What do you choose?

No dragons. That's the easy answer. No monster girls either.
